Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: HECTOR LUIS RODRIGUEZ
Reviews.Content: It is an excellent phone with its 4.5 inch screen which is an ideal size sharpness of the images is very good, the pictures taken are very good even at night and in low light is not a problem for your double flash, its stereo sound is very good and sounds very strong, I connected to the internet with wifi and runs quite well, it is unlocked and here in Venezuela with digitel line is excellent even with its 3G, applications run very well and quite fast, has nothing to phone envy any famous brand, and the price value relationship would recommend 100%

Reviews.Title: it is a good phone but the screen protector glue is does no work
Reviews.Author: Yuraima Figueroa
Reviews.Content: it is a good phone, but the screen protector glue does no work, any way the phone is great ty

Reviews.Title: Bad purchase!
Reviews.Author: Juan Rodrigo Torres
Reviews.Content: The camera is awful ! and the screen was not functioning correctly! I have to return it !!The touch screen doesn't work on every point its a shame!! :(All the pictures was taken blurry and bad quality!

Reviews.Title: its god
Reviews.Author: ALEJANDRA M GUERRA L
Reviews.Content: The phone is excellent team. Works perfectly with Digitel and Movilnet lines, here in Venezuela ... I suggest you be cautious when sending, .... Therefore, the cell came in its original box wrapped in a bag, causing pressure on the phone .. .. a result of that, the screen is slightly detached

Reviews.Title: should be checked before shipping
Reviews.Author: Desire Feltrer
Reviews.Content: good phone but you get me unlit and the OS is in Chinese, I think before sending a product should I check for the same work and the operating system should not be in Chinese but depending on the country where fence

Reviews.Title: Huawei u8950d
Reviews.Author: Lt. Guage
Reviews.Content: awesome phoneshipping did not take long , even came with a screen protectormy one an only complaint is the batterythe batter will not keep charge, the battery shipped with this phone was already installed and is dated 2012 ..other than that the phone and its operations is flawless!!yes i would recommend to a friend
